# TAKER API
```https://orderbook.orbs.network```
## Quote

```POST /taker/v1/quote```

### body
```JSON
{
	"InAmount":"10000000000000000000",
	"minOutAmount":"",
	"inToken"  :"MATIC",
    "inTokenAddress": "", // alternatively
	"outToken"  :"USDT",
    "outTokenAddress": "", // alternatively
}
```

### response
```JSON
{
  "outAmount": "4196299",
  "outToken": "USDT",
  "inAmount": "10000000000000000000",
  "inToken": "MATIC",
  "swapId": "",
  "abiCall": "",
  "contract": "",
  "fragments": []
}
```

## Swap (Firm quote)
```POST /taker/v1/swap```
### body
```JSON
{
	"InAmount":"10000000000000000000",
	"minOutAmount":"",
	"inToken"  :"MATIC",
    "inTokenAddress": "", // alternatively
	"outToken"  :"USDT",
    "outTokenAddress": "", // alternatively
}
```
### response
```JSON
{
  "outAmount": "4187308",
  "outToken": "USDT",
  "inAmount": "10000000000000000000",
  "inToken": "MATIC",
  "swapId": "fac113af-ba26-4122-bd65-132e6cbca32e",
  "abiCall": "",
  "contract": "0x4C4B950432189b3283A5111A6963ee318109695c",
  "fragments": [
    {
      "signature": "0x56cba2e072804247c24b4b1030222a1c58010099d468b362d8d32e8782f4a7a75c70dc3d769b99fe1406f920fa83a8c348a6227613d9362bbe8ce7326475483aaa",
      "abiOrder": {
        "Info": {
          "Reactor": "0x4c4b950432189b3283a5111a6963ee318109695c",
          "Swapper": "0x3bcd2b75cf99c81e81c304d223c7137847a4177c",
          "Nonce": 3375048333,
          "Deadline": 1723724074,
          "AdditionalValidationContract": "0x0000000000000000000000000000000000000000",
          "AdditionalValidationData": ""
        },
        "ExclusiveFiller": "0x896d9b9eee18f6c88c5575b78247834029375575",
        "ExclusivityOverrideBps": 0,
        "Input": {
          "Token": "0xc2132d05d31c914a87c6611c10748aeb04b58e8f",
          "Amount": 5488123438
        },
        "Outputs": [
          {
            "Token": "0x0d500b1d8e8ef31e21c99d1db9a6444d3adf1270",
            "Amount": 13106565800000000000000,
            "Recipient": "0x3bcd2b75cf99c81e81c304d223c7137847a4177c"
          }
        ]
      },
      "takerInAmount": "10000000000000000000",
      "takerOutAmount": "4187308"
    }
  ]
}
```

- ```swapId``` can be used in ```/abort``` swap

## Abot Swap

```POST /taker/v1/abort/{swapId}```

e.g 
```POST /taker/v1/abort/fac113af-ba26-4122-bd65-132e6cbca32e```
